item.title: IRS tests free e-filing system that could compete with tax prep giants
item.description: - The IRS has developed a prototype system that will enable Americans to file their tax returns through the government without paying for tax preparation services.

item.title: Brex's Prompt Engineering Guide
item.description: - Brex has created a guide for "prompt engineering" based on lessons learned from researching and creating Large Language Models (LLMs) for production use cases.

item.title: Show HN: Willow – Open-source privacy-focused voice assistant hardware
item.description: - Willow is an open-source voice assistant hardware platform built on the ESP IDF that provides privacy-focused, self-hosted, and low-cost technology.

item.title: Pixpaint
item.description: - Pixpaint is a new mobile app that allows users to turn their photos into digital artwork.

item.title: Kids who get smartphones earlier become adults with worse mental health
item.description: - A new report from Sapien Labs reveals that younger age of receiving a smartphone is linked to worse mental health, especially for women.

item.title: Dell goes back on WFH pledge, forces employees to come back to the office
item.description: - Dell is now asking employees to return to the office, after initially allowing them to work from home during the pandemic.

item.title: Uncensored Models
item.description: - An uncensored model refers to a huggingface transformer model that is not aligned with specific and/or ethical guidelines.

item.title: Come back, c2.com, we still need you
item.description: - This post is about the WikiWikiWeb, an online community that has been around since 1995.

item.title: LobbyFacts – Exposing lobbying in European institutions
item.description: - LobbyFacts allows users to search and analyze data from the official EU Transparency Register to track lobbyists and their influence on EU institutions - Users can search for information on the biggest lobby spenders, lobby consultancies, and companies spending more on lobbying than the previous year - The accuracy of the data is dependent on the accuracy of the information given by the registrants themselves and is not necessarily independently verified

item.title: This blog is hosted on my Android phone
item.description: - The blog writer explains how to turn an Android device into a web server that can be accessed from a public URL or your own domain.
